posts.author: Rivieroscope
posts.post_text: April 21, 2015 at 4:35 PM#2Hi Waldi, you have to open first the setup on Grandma2 then  open Remote inputs setup and select midiremotes as you can see on attached file. Follow by open a commandline window and when you press a key on the Elation the programmer said to you the number of the key , follow to write the command you want in the midiremotes and select the good number to have what you expect for.Filesmidiremotes.zip123.02 kB – 683 Downloads
